participant_1.background:
I have been in 2 car crashes in my life.
I like to play sports and get fresh air.
I am going to school to get a degree now.
I like watching tv in my free time as well.
Food and water are essential to me in life.

participant_2.background:
I have borderline personality disorder.
It is my universe , and everyone else is just a character in it.
I work as a dental assistant in a ritzy part of town.
At night , i party hard in the atlanta club scene , and i never miss a music festival.

content.text: It's nice to meet you! I'm [name].
Nice to meet you too! I'm [name].
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to party hard in the Atlanta club scene, and I never miss a music festival.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm more of a homebody, but I do like to go out and have fun every once in a while.
I can respect that. I don't always go out, but when I do, I go all out.
I'm the same way. I like to make the most of it when I do go out.
What do you like to do for fun at home?
I like to watch TV, play video games, and read. I also like to cook and bake.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love to cook and bake too. I'm actually a dental assistant in a ritzy part of town.
That's cool! I've always been interested in dentistry.
It's a great career. I get to help people, and I make a good living.
That's awesome! I'm glad you're happy with your job.
I am. It's a lot of hard work, but it's worth it.
I'm sure it is. Well, it was nice talking to you. I hope we can chat again sometime.
You too! It was nice meeting you.
